hero.headline: Give yourself the credit you deserve.
hero.sub-copy: If you’ve got money in your savings account, you’ll also get access to a secured line of credit, and all the credit building that comes with it.

dog-just-ate.headline: THE UNPLANNED-PAYMENT PAYMENT PLAN.
dog-just-ate.body: Your Tend debit card comes with a secured line of credit worth 75% of the amount in your savings. Because no matter how much you budget, sometimes you just need access to a little more cash—and you shouldn’t have to tap into your savings to get it.

build-credit.headline: Consider it a head start on your dreams.
build-credit.body: Start building your credit history, so you have more points in your favor when you’re ready to apply for a mortgage, get a car loan, or start that moonshot business idea.

track-credit-score.headline: Keep track of your score
track-credit-score.body: Follow your credit progress in the Tend app—no inbox clutter included.
